channel.title: 317 server pk delays
channel.description:
Hey guys, well, when i pk on my oldschool server, i realised that pking is very slow.
When i use a dds, i click the spec bar, it takes really long to acually spec like 3 seconds after you click, the spec bar lights up then, it doesn't light up (that's when it specs quickly) but it doesn't it takes like 2 seconds then finally attacks. same for every weapon and ranged, any way to fix guys!? plz.!

item.title: 317 server pk delays
item.dc:creator: @shank_beast shank beast
item.description:
@shank_beast wrote:

Hey guys, well, when i pk on my oldschool server, i realised that pking is very slow.

When i use a dds, i click the spec bar, it takes really long to acually spec like 3 seconds after you click, the spec bar lights up then, it doesn’t light up (that’s when it specs quickly) but it doesn’t it takes like 2 seconds then finally attacks. same for every weapon and ranged, any way to fix guys!? plz.!
